00022 #include "mas5-stat/workflow/MAS5Workflow.h"

00024 #include "mas5-stat/workflow/MAS5CHPUtils.h"
00025 #include "mas5-stat/workflow/MAS5ReportDataAccessor.h"
00026 //
00027 #include "exp_report/src/ExpressionProbeSetReporter.h"
00028 //
00029 
00030 using namespace ExpressionReport;
00031 
00032 #define DEFAULT_PROBE_PAIR_THRESHOLD 1
00033 
00034 /*
00035  * Clear the members.
00036  */
00037 MAS5Workflow::MAS5Workflow()
00038 {
00039         Clear();
00040 }
00041 
00042 /*
00043  * Clear the members.
00044  */
00045 MAS5Workflow::~MAS5Workflow()
00046 {
00047         Clear();
00048 }
00049 
00050 /*
00051  * Clear the members.
00052  */
00053 void MAS5Workflow::Clear()
00054 {
00055         errorMsg = "";
00056         controls.Clear();
00057         exp.Clear();
00058     programName.clear();
00059     programCompany.clear();
00060     programId.clear();
00061     probePairThreshold = DEFAULT_PROBE_PAIR_THRESHOLD;
00062         saveToLegacyFile = false;
00063 }
00064 
00065 /*
00066  * Run the algorithm and report and save the results to a CHP file
00067  */
00068 bool MAS5Workflow::Execute(const std::string &celFile, const std::string &baselineCelFile, const std::string &cdfFile, const std::string &chpFile)
00069 {
00070         errorMsg = "";
00071         if (exp.RunStat(celFile.c_str(), baselineCelFile.c_str(), cdfFile.c_str()) == false)
00072         {
00073                 errorMsg = exp.GetError();
00074                 return false;
00075         }
00076 
00077         // Run the report
00078         MAS5ReportDataAccessor dataAccessor(&exp);
00079         ExpressionProbeSetReporter report;
00080     const std::list<int> probeSetIndicies;
00081         bool reportPass = report.Run(dataAccessor.IsAntiSense(), probePairThreshold, &dataAccessor, &controls, probeSetIndicies, false);
00082         if (reportPass == false)
00083         {
00084                 errorMsg = "Failed to run the report";
00085                 return false;
00086         }
00087 
00088         // Save the file.
00089         MAS5CHPUtils utils;
00090     utils.SetProgramInformation(programName, programCompany, programId);
00091         if (utils.SaveCHPFile(chpFile, exp, report, reportPass, saveToLegacyFile) == false)
00092         {
00093                 errorMsg = "Unable to write the CHP file.";
00094                 return false;
00095         }
00096         return true;
00097 }
